title: Does *77 really call the State troopers to check if the unmarked car flashing red top lights on the hightway is really a policeman?   I got an E mail saying it was a valid call, Is it?
text:
This is partly true, but more of an urban legend.

In North Carolina *HP will connect you to the Highway Patrol, but
it's not recommended for emergency calls; they suggest 911 instead



Here's what Snopes.com has to say about it:



http://www.snopes.com/crime/warnings/fakecop.asp
